Subjects: Mary Magdalen, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St Mary Madgalene — in couplets

NLS1921.First Lines:
…& Martha keped swiþe welHir londes euerich a
                    del…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Þat euer schal left wiþ outen endeAmen amen sigge
                    al weGod it ous graunt [ ]
NLS1921.Note:
Begins imperfectly, with line-ends of lines 53-96 on stub f.
                        61avb; 692 lines including lacuna, f. 65ra, plus 44
                    line-ends; last few words cut out with miniature at bottom of
                    column.
